required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Neoadjuvant TDM1 With Lapatinib and Abraxane Compared With Trastuzumab Plus Pertuzumab With Paclitaxel
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Open Label PhII Trial of Neoadjuvant Trastuzumab Emtansine (Te) in Combination w/Lapatinib (L) Followed by Abraxane (A) Compared w/Trastuzumab Plus Pertuzumab Followed by Paclitaxel in Her 2 Neu Over-Expressed Breast Cancer Patients

brief_summary.textblock:
Purpose: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the Pathological Complete Response (pCR) of the breast when trastuzumab emtansine (TDM-1) plus Lapatinib plus Abraxane is combined in newly diagnosed HER2 positive breast cancer.
This is a randomized, open label Phase II neo-adjuvant study comparing the efficacy of neoadjuvant Trastuzumab Emtansine (TDM1) plus lapatinib follow by Abraxane, versus trastuzumab (herceptin) plus Pertuzumab follow by paclitaxel.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of surgery, approximately 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the pathological complete response rate (pCR) in the breast after treatment with Trastuzumab Emtansine plus Lapatinib follow by Abraxane in women with HER2 Neu over-expressed breast cancer patients.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until completion of neoadjuvant treatment, approximately 16 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: To determine the clinical response rate in patients with palpable disease.
To determine the imaging response to neoadjuvant therapy through breast imaging (mammogram, ultrasound and MRI) using RECIST.
To compare overall objective response rate in both treatment groups.

secondary_outcome.measure: toxicity, safety and efficacy of study treatment
secondary_outcome.description: To assess toxicity, safety and efficacy of Trastuzumab Emtansine when combine with Lapatinib follow by Abraxane

other_outcome.description: To determine predictive markers for sensitivity and resistance to Trastuzumab Emtansine when combined with Lapatinib follow by Abraxane

arm_group.arm_group_label: TDM1 with Laptinib followed by Abraxane
arm_group.description: Trastuzumab Emtansine IV every three weeks plus Lapatinib oral daily for a total of six (6) weeks followed by Abraxane IV weekly for twelve (12) weeks.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Herceptin plus Pertuzumab followed by paclitaxel
arm_group.description: Trastuzumab (Herceptin) IV weekly plus Pertuzumab IV for a total of six (6) weeks, followed by weekly IV paclitaxel for twelve (12) weeks.

intervention.description: trastuzumab emtansine [Kadcyla] Intravenous repeating dose every 3 weeks
intervention.arm_group_label: TDM1 with Laptinib followed by Abraxane
Herceptin plus Pertuzumab followed by paclitaxel

intervention.description: Lapatinib repeating dose taken orally every day for 6 weeks
intervention.arm_group_label: TDM1 with Laptinib followed by Abraxane

intervention.description: Abraxane repeating dose weekly IV for up to 12 weeks
intervention.arm_group_label: TDM1 with Laptinib followed by Abraxane

intervention.description: Paclitaxel IV repeating dose weekly for up to 12 weeks
intervention.arm_group_label: Herceptin plus Pertuzumab followed by paclitaxel

intervention.description: Pertuzumab repeating dose weekly IV for up to 12 weeks
intervention.arm_group_label: Herceptin plus Pertuzumab followed by paclitaxel
